posts.post_content:
Player name appears to be Molina from Havanna Club.  Early days of professional baseball in Latin America.  Very cool piece.

Asking $700 or best offer paypal friends and family or add 3% for goods or payment by check is also fine.  Please pm with questions

Thanks!
Eric
